snippet: The weekend of elegant fund-raisers also included protesters, who said they were offended by the reach of corporate money in Republican politics.
abstract: MItt Romney attends three major fund-raisers in East Hampton, New York, where he is expected to haul in close to $4 million; day of elegant parties is disrupted by protests from groups who say they are offended by the reach of corporate money in Republican politics.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and SARAH WHEATON
byline.contributor: Michael Barbaro reported from East Hampton, and Sarah Wheaton from Southampton, N.Y. Jim Rutenberg contributed reporting from Montauk, N.Y.

lead_paragraph: The weekend of elegant fund-raisers also included protesters, who said they were offended by the reach of corporate money in Republican politics.

headline.seo: Romney Mines the Hamptons for Campaign Cash
headline.main: Romney Mines the Hamptons for Campaign Cash
headline.print_headline: Romney Mines the Hamptons for Campaign Cash
